snippet.title: Sealed with a Kiss ~Bride of an Asmodian~ Official Trailer // FREE Otome Game
snippet.description:
"Sealed with a Kiss ~Bride of an Asmodian~" is an otome smartphone game by AbracadabraGames.
GooglePlay:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=info.otomedou.fwe.maokoiEn

App Store:
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/sealed-with-a-kiss-bride-of-an-asmodian/id1263429112?l=ja&ls=1&mt=8

☆ Story ☆
"Become a Bride, if you don't want the world to be destroyed..."

Defeated by the Dark Lord himself, you - a brave Hero - are held captive.
As requested by the capricious Dark Lord, you will have to marry one of the handsome Dark Princess! 

Can a Heroine defeat the Dark Lord and save the world?
Are you ready to become the bride of the next Demon King?
What does your destiny have in store for you? ☆

Category/Genre: Romance ADV / Otome
Age Restrictions: for all ages
Price: Free to Play (in-app purchases)
